, May 19 , 2014 / PRNewswire-USNewswire / -- Babson College President Kerry Murphy Healey today announced the launch of the Global Scholars Program , offering four - year , full - tuition , need - based scholarships to qualified undergraduate international students who otherwise would not have the financial means to attend the top - ranked business school for Entrepreneurship .

, May 19 , 2014 / PRNewswire-USNewswire / -- Babson College President Kerry Murphy Healey today announced the launch of the Global Scholars Program , offering four - year , full - tuition , need - based scholarships to qualified undergraduate international students who otherwise would not have the financial means to attend the top - ranked business school for Entrepreneurship .

The scholarship program is designed to offer new opportunities for highly qualified international students who will , with Babson 's support , lead the next generation of entrepreneurial innovators to create economic and social value across the global marketplace .

The enrollment of a more diverse community of students in terms of geography , culture , country of origin , and socioeconomic status will help all Babson students develop a global mindset and improve their effectiveness as socially responsible leaders .

Through the Global Scholars Program , new ideas , perspectives and opportunities will be brought to campus , which the Babson community will then share with the world .
I can personally testify to the transformative nature of international education , said President Healey .

The Babson Global Scholars Program recognizes that entrepreneurship is the powerful force needed to help solve the economic , social , and environmental issues confronting our world community .

Beginning in the fall of 2014 , Babson 's Global Scholars Program will award four - year , full - tuition , need - based scholarships to qualified international students who otherwise would not have the financial means to attend Babson .

The first group of scholars has been admitted and will join the College in the fall .

The Global Scholars Program is intended to attract talented students from outside the United States who will benefit from Babson 's mission to encourage new perspectives among peers , increase adaptability in a range of contexts , and expand the reach of living with a global entrepreneurial mindset .

To be considered for the Global Scholars Program , students must apply for financial aid by completing the College Scholarship Service ( CSS ) Profile form by the stated deadline .
